source-layers.sql: SELECT the_geom_webmercator, cartodb_id AS id, area_name FROM historic_districts_lpc_{{ENV}} WHERE status_of_ = 'DESIGNATED'
SELECT the_geom_webmercator, cartodb_id AS id, lm_name, lm_type FROM individual_landmarks_lpc WHERE (lm_type = 'Individual Landmark' OR lm_type = 'Interior Landmark') AND last_actio = 'DESIGNATED'
SELECT the_geom_webmercator, cartodb_id AS id, scen_lm_na FROM scenic_landmarks_lpc_{{ENV}} WHERE last_actio = 'DESIGNATED'

meta.description: Individual Landmarks Shapefile, NYC Open Data Portal
